EmailTemplate.name: Temp Street Closures Hearing Date Assigned
EmailTemplate.subject: Temporary Street Closure Application has been processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your application for a temporary street closure has been processed and your request will be on the ISCOTT hearing agenda on {!Case.Public_Hearing_Date__c}. The meeting is at 9 AM at 1 South Van Ness Avenue. Staff will follow-up a week prior to the meeting with a copy of the agenda.
Please attend this meeting to present information about your temporary street closure application, if you (or a representative) are unable to attend the meeting, please let me know immediately. Please note: If your event is an annual Neighborhood Block Party closure and has not changed from past approvals, you may not be required to attend.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
